description: Quickly transform a burger kit and a few simple ingredients into a delish dinner. Save this delicious burger recipe for nights when time is of the essence.
keywords: Beef burger,Quick & easy dinner,Weeknight dinner,Dinner Made Easy,Beef,Beetroot
name: Aussie Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat.

Halve buns from burger kit, reserving patties, cheese and relish. Cook buns, cut-sides down, for 1 minute or until toasted. Transfer to a board. Cook pineapple, turning, for 2 minutes or until charred. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.
Cook reserved patties for 3 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through, topping with reserved cheese for the last 30 seconds of cooking.
Spread cut sides of bun bases with a little of the reserved relish, then top with lettuce, patties, beetroot and pineapple. Sandwich with bun lids. Serve with fries and remaining relish.
